website_summaries.verdict: Available in a variety of colors, the affordable Travelon is a secure crossbody bag.
pros: Lightweight and has a special lock pocket to keep valuables safe
The material is easy to wipe down and is sturdy enough to withstand being cut
RFID-blocking compartments for keeping your credit card information safe
Bag can be adjusted to ensure it fits snug against the body
cons: The strap could use a bit more padding

customer_reviews.title: Best travel bag I've ever found!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing travel bag. I've been to many different countries, and this is the best bag I've ever found. I love that two of the main compartments have locking zippers (take a look at my photos), and that the bag strap is slice-proof. All of my belongings will be safe! It's also great that the straps can be adjusted to wear over one shoulder or be made longer to wear across the body (check my photos). It's comfortable and can store a lot without feeling bulky. If you are traveling, buy this bag!!!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Poor build quality (SEE PICTURES). Started falling apart after 6 months. Totally unusable after 1 year. Cheap buttons/zippers.
customer_reviews.text: Quite disappointed in this bag. It was a very good travel bag while it lasted, but it did not last very long. After 6 months of use, one of the front magnetic buttons fell apart (see picture). After 1 year of use, the main zipper fell apart (see picture). It is now unusable because I can't get into or secure the main compartment. I had very much hoped to get more than 1 year out of the bag, but nothing is ever built to last anymore. The Travelon bag has proven to be yet another cheap bag with a very limited life before it breaks and falls apart. I suggest finding another manufacturer to buy from.
customer_reviews.author: P. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: SECOND BAG WAS WORTHLESS
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag and, while it has all kinds of compartments, zippers and pockets, the second bag that I bought was horrible. The main zipper brought almost immediately (after sticking), the inside zipper broke before that, and it started looking worn out pretty much after a few times out. I had to throw it out. It lasted maybe 6 months; the first one lasted a long, good time, to Greece and back to San Francisco, to Panama and back to San Francisco 2x. But this one is useless. I just threw it out and purchased a travel purse from another, more reliable vendor. A waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Van Horn

customer_reviews.title: Quality an issue
customer_reviews.text: Basically, I liked the purse though it is necessarily compact ... takes getting used to. My biggest issue is that the main compartment zipper, by about a short few months of use, began to open itself up from the start point; it just began to separate. It has progressively gotten worse. I hadn't used it for some time since we didn't travel but now I'm using it again and it won't stay closed at all. I've had it long enough I doubt it's returnable but it is definitely a defect. I would probably give a 4 star rating for travel except the opening invalidates that.
customer_reviews.author: neal sperling

customer_reviews.title: Pickpockets and Chip Scammers Beware!
customer_reviews.text: Good. Prevents pickpockets. I tested The RFID blocking fabric on my RFID badge at work. The reader has to be touching the badge and even then it was difficult to make the reader pick up the chip in the badge. Strap started to fray by the end of the week but still useable for another trip. It's difficult to clip clised when you have arthritis. Two front pockets are easy to get into so don't put anything of value there. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Me

customer_reviews.title: Great little bag.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made bag. It is both functional and attractive. I purchased it for an upcoming vacation and decided to try it out a bit early. I've received many compliments on it in just a few days. It holds all my things, but I did have to purchase a smaller, thinner wallet (to be fair, my other one was quite large). I preemptively ordered a padded shoulder/neck strap, though many people probably wouldn't need one, I think I'll be happier with one.
customer_reviews.author: dazie

customer_reviews.title: it's a purse, but a really good one. for left handers & no carabiner!
customer_reviews.text: Glad I bought it. Its a very well made bag. I didn't think about this until it arrived but its designed for left handed people. If you want to have the 2 front pockets in the front then it sits on your left side, not really a problem but maybe they'll make a right handed version in future. Also mine did not have a carabiner for the strap to purse part like in the photographs, instead its a pull clip ( see picture I uploaded) but it is of good quality. Part of why I chose this was the carabiner (because of strength) so that was a bit of a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: A. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Secure and Provides Peace of Mind
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! Well, I don't love the way it looks as much as I love the security it provided on crowded European trains. It stays close to the body, is very difficult to get into quickly when locked and made me feel like my cash, cards and docs were secure. It provided peace of mind when I had other things on my mind than worrying about what I would do if my stuff was jacked. It helped me have a relaxing vacation and I will use it again and again.
customer_reviews.author: bleelee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travel purse
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this same bag for over 2 years now and it’s still in great condition and hasn’t failed me yet! I love the locking zippers, and all the pockets are great. The straps are really sturdy too. I go on hikes with this bag and it holds up in some extreme conditions. I’ve also taken it all over the world and felt very safe walking around with it. It stays close to your body and isn’t very showy so doesn’t attract attention.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that the bag was going to be very big but it turns out it has the perfect size: not big at all but not too small. The material looks resistent and feels light, it also has an internal mini lamp to look thru your stuff . Inside it has 4 pockets (1 of them has zipper and the other is for cards) plus space for your pens. Nice bag , really nice!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Best crossbody purse ever
customer_reviews.text: This bag is exactly what I was looking for and then some. I have used it for a bit now and I absolutely love it, it even has a tiny pocket inside for your chapstick (that's a big deal for me). It lays flat to your body so it's not big or bulky at all, it's light weight, it has so many pockets I don't even use them all, the inside is buttery soft and it's waterproof and identity theft proof, what more do you need? My only complaint is it doesn't always want to sit up when I set it on a table but I can deal with that because of all of the great features this bag has.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this from Warehouse Deals and item arrived with ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this from Warehouse Deals and item arrived with should strap torn out and seam gaping wide open with threads hanging.
customer_reviews.author: MyAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Bad manufacturing of purse
customer_reviews.text: Like the style of the purse but first one I received the strap was coming apart I figured let me return it and get a replacement might just be this one. Received replacement same thing happen. Now I need to return this one also I'm kind of disappointed since I really like the style
customer_reviews.author: ROSIO GONZALEZ

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THAT IT HAS THE ANTI-THEFT PROTECTION FOR CREDIT CARDS
customer_reviews.text: FIRST, I LOVE THAT IT HAS THE ANTI-THEFT PROTECTION FOR CREDIT CARDS, SECOND I LOVE THE COMPARTMENTS, THIRD I LOVE THE UNCUTTABLE LONG STRAP, THE ONLY THING MISSING IS THE SIZE... JUST NEEDED IT TO BE A LITTLE BIGGER. IT ALWAYS LOOKS A BIT STUFFED, AND I'M ONLY PUTTING IN WHAT I NEEDJ!! IT'S VERY WELL MADE, HIGH QUALITY FABRIC AND WORKMANSHIP. WISH THE POCKET SNAPS WERE MAGNETIC TOO! HOWEVER, ALL-IN-ALL, IT HIT MOST OF WHAT I WANTED. (THIS IS RICHARD'S WIFE.... YOU PROBABLY REALIZED IT WASN'T RICHARD, LOL!!!
customer_reviews.author: TRS

customer_reviews.title: It was Perfect for my trip. I even wore it under my coat.
customer_reviews.text: I recently traveled to Amsterdam and this bag was perfect for my trip. This bag is not meant to put the world inside of it, it is for basic things and to travel light. I put a thin wallet inside of it , a small camera , a scarf, gloves and when on the plane my iPad. It is a great size for those who don't want to come out on pictures with huge bags and feel secure in crowds.it has great anti theft features. (Watch the video) excellent purse.
customer_reviews.author: P. I. cruz

customer_reviews.title: Very poorly designed.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this but... Very poor design.. The strap is attached backwards so the buckle is facing your shoulder.. The main zipper compartment goes over a 90 degree angle...super difficult to zip and unzip. The fabric is heavy. And the overall capacity is small...with awkward access to the main compartment. Worst thing?? The buckle is stitched on in reverse... So the buckle digs into your shoulder.. Very poor design.. Returning...
customer_reviews.author: shopper mom

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight travel purse
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for travelling abroad, but I am still using it for everyday. It is fairly narrow, but I did fit theTravelon Safe Id Daisy Family Passport Case and Travelon Safe Id Daisy Ladies Wallet, hairbrush, reading glasses, phone, Kleenex, hand-wipes, chapstick, lipstick, gum and keys. If you are going to pack more than that, you might want a bigger purse. It has 2 outside zipper compartments and two snap-down small pockets, a deep inside zippered compartment, a interior clip for keys and multiple small compartments inside for your phone or small camera, glasses, pens, etc. I like how lightweight it is, and that is hangs a little more to the front than on the side.
customer_reviews.author: DFolla

customer_reviews.title: Design weakens zipper if overfilled.
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this purse EXCEPT the fact the zipper zips down the side of the bag. I sometimes neglect to clean out my purse as often as I should and over time, the zipper has stopped working-- it pulls apart because of the stress on the zipper zipping up over the edge of the bag. Now it won't work even when barely full. I am replacing this one with the bucket design in hopes that the zipper being only at the top and not going over the side of the bag will eliminate this problem....
customer_reviews.author: workrelated

customer_reviews.title: not as user friendly as I thought...
customer_reviews.text: This has a hint of shine to it which makes it looks like good quality (which it is) but imo, also makes it stand out for thieves. It also was larger then I expected. It is quite stiff and the small opening makes it difficult to get things into and out of (which is great to keep robbers out but also great to have robbers attack you as you spend your time trying to get into your pocket book-lol. It is definitely safe though and seems of good quality though.
customer_reviews.author: 1whovalusopinions

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart in a small village in Europe on third day of use!!!
customer_reviews.text: Sooo dissappointed. I bought this for a two week trip in Central Europe and on the third day I used it the strap fell apart! The strap latch completely broke apart and left me crawling around a sidewalk in Hungary trying to find the parts. I had to buy a replacement bag and as someone who travels for two weeks out of a carry-on the space it is taking up in my bag is a huge drag. Not happy and won't be home for two weeks and not sure if i can even exchange it outside of thirty days! Very annoyed.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for the regular traveler
customer_reviews.text: I've had this bag for a few months now. I travel a lot for work and it's been all over the country with me. I love the pockets and thoughtful built in spots to store things, like the chapstick or lipstick loop in the front pocket. I use the locking zipper feature when traveling or in crowded places where sometimes might try to snag my wallet. The only negative thing is the built in light. It doesn't work well and keeps coming apart. That said, it's not a large bag. I don't loose things in it. I do get a lot of compliments on it! I often slide it into another bag so I can hit my carry on limit.
customer_reviews.author: Brook McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Mostly okay
customer_reviews.text: Took this bag on a trip and felt safer with the way the zippers can "lock" shut. It was durable, held up in the rain, and carried everything I needed neatly in the different pockets. Less 1 star because the strap wasn't 100% comfortable and I don't know if it was a design flaw or just on me but it wouldn't stay on my shoulder and was hanging off of and digging into my neck most of the time. Not sure if I'd use again for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Daughter said it was perfect
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was traveling to Cambodia and Thailand and I wanted her to have a bag that would be safe for her to carry her important things in while traveling. She said it was perfect and worked out really well for her. She had no mishaps at all. The bag is a good quality bag. Nice locations of pockets on the inside and the zippers had clips so you could prevent someone from pickpocketing. I was happy when I saw the quality of the bag when it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lay

customer_reviews.title: Not slash-proof.
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this through Amazon Warehouse deals and found that it had a slash under the front pocket. Not sure if this is a defective product but the description states that the body construction is suppose to be slash-proof also along with the strap, I guess whoever purchased this before me returned it for being defective after testing it out themselves (?). I am returning the product the same day as received.
customer_reviews.author: Mudpie

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this purse when we moved to Italy. I heard that petty theft was high in downtown Naples and certain other areas. This purse has a small clip you can connect the main zipper to so it will not easily open. It crosses over your shoulder and hangs at your side. It does not hold a lot of stuff, so you may need to lighten your load if you are used to carrying a lot in your purse. I have been using this purse now for over a year and am very pleased with it. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Teen loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for a teenager. I wondered if she'd like it as her tastes are odd. Well, she loved it! She immediately began transferring items from her older purse into the new one. At first, she was concerned that everything wouldn't fit into the new bag, because it looked smaller. Well, we got past that pretty quickly. It all fit, including a 8 1/2 x 11 notebook she carries around. It still hangs flat. She was impressed by the attached light. The security features are great and give an added sense of security and peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Lady DA

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag, lasted me a year.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bag. I've used it every day for the past year. The material is super tough, no signs of wear. However the main zipper could be better. First of all, it's not the best quality. I will have to replace it as it comes open from both sides now. The other issue I have had with the zipper is that it often gets caught on the flap inside the bag. It can be annoying at times as it gets stuck in the fabric and can be difficult to get out. Would I buy it again? Yes I would.
customer_reviews.author: HAAC

customer_reviews.title: I can't say enough good things about this bag
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about this bag. I had previously purchased another Travelon bag, a smaller one, before a trip to Italy two years ago and loved it. I needed something a little bigger to go to England the following fall. I love this one so much that it's become my regular, daily purse. Lots of storage, durable, smart design. My mom loved it so much that she bought herself one - just to carry around for every day use. My daughter has since inherited my first, smaller Travelon bag. You feel very secure with the locking zippers, built in cable and mesh, and the ability to lock the strap around a table leg. Highly, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for travel!  Get one!
customer_reviews.text: Used this bag for a recent trip to Rome, Venice & Amalfi Coast. Felt very safe knowing the straps were reinforced with metal to prevent thieves from cutting the straps. Loved the shape and crossbody design. The bag was comfortable to carry. Was able to hold the purse close to my body and access all pockets and areas easily and in a safe manner. Loved how the zipper had the extra security of clasping to a ring to make it harder to unzip by thieves. Loved this bag. Will definitely use when traveling again.
customer_reviews.author: Charmaine

customer_reviews.title: Great travel purse!
customer_reviews.text: I love the cross body bag. It keeps my hands free as I travel. I also feel a great measure of security knowing that the strap can't be cut and that the zippers lock. The bag is deeper rather than wide, so it fits flat against your side as you walk. Even though that also makes it more difficult to dig things out of your bag, it also makes it harder to snatch something out of your bag if the pockets are open. I love traveling with this purse.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Faul

customer_reviews.title: Great travel bag - with style!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love Travelon for traveling internationally anyway, but this striped edition has style that seems to leave my poor little much beloved black one in the closet! I love the stripes!! It has a beautiful purplish rose interior that sets it off, too. Travelon is the best for safety, too, with locking zippers and snatch proof handles. It also offers some RFID protection - which you should have in your wallet and passport carrier anyway. I highly recommend this brand and this style in particular.
customer_reviews.author: B. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Handy and lots of compartments
customer_reviews.text: I used it all over Europe. Has container for my passport on back, front zipper is where I used my two handheld battery pack for my iPhone and it’s cords. Front pockets for my pad n pen, sanitizer, gum n lipsticks, train stubs. Middle pockets for my coin wallet, money inside zipper, my two iPhones one local phone w my sim card n my USA iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: Kudos great product and a great price, I like this brand were going to buy more
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag . My wife uses it and it keeps her things organized. She feels much more secure with the zippers fastened when she is riding the train or just going grocery shopping. These people really think about the details, the bags are highly organized. We are going to buy more as gifts for my wife's friends that have commented on how nice her bag is. Kudos great product and a great price. This is our fourth Travelon bag, and they're extremely durable. We're going to stick with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Cycle whiz

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for traveling; not easily snatched, very functional
customer_reviews.text: I use this bag all the time now, and not just for traveling. Very sturdy, the safety clips take a little time to get used to, but once you know how, you can open it pretty quickly (as in, you yourself, nobody else will be able to get to it without you knowing it). Not too heavy when hanging across body. I picked the wine colored one, and it has held up well (color etc). Does not "look" dirty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: dutchego

customer_reviews.title: LOVED IT
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about leaving things but having this bag relieved me of the worry. I kept passports at hand, boarding passes, cash and a credit card, sunglasses, and snacks, battery for recharging our phones, two cell phones, and ink pens, pill bottles, lotion. Oh, and flat headphones!!!! All in this bag and smartly arranged and the high end on one side is perfect for the longer items like a hair comb. I am going to buy one more for my daughter! This is a must have for all of our trips in town and out.
customer_reviews.author: YKG

customer_reviews.title: I liked the security features very much
customer_reviews.text: I bought this trip for 2 major trips I had planned for 2017. I liked the security features very much, it gave me a little peace of mind while traveling in South America and Europe, especially the locking zippers. Unfortunately, within the first trip I took( 2 weeks to Argentina), the seams on the shoulder strap began to fray. I was discouraged to see such poor quality. The fraying got worse in Europe, also a 2 week trip, and the front zipper pocket started to fray. The purse held all my things nicely and was a good fit, I was just frustrated that it fell apart so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: James Poco

customer_reviews.title: For Safety it's Great
customer_reviews.text: Very secure, but I happen to need a bigger opening and a bit more space inside. Loved the design in all ways except that. If I didn't need to put so much inside, or if it were larger, it would be perfect. Also, it's comfortable to wear. But how the heck am I supposed to carry all my stuff? I ended up getting an anti-theft wallet and putting it inside my regular handbag for the trip.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Lotus

customer_reviews.title: Great for international trips!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for an international trip. I wanted something that was functional and had additional security ... but was still fashionable(ish). Not an easy find! This fit the bill perfectly. It's made of very heavy duty material and was still enough room for a wallet, small umbrella and camera (tight fit, but it worked!). Also I was a big fan on the latching features. It was still easy to access the contents inside the purse, but I felt secure enough walking around the city and wasn't constantly be thinking about making sure the purse was in front of me. It's also comfortable! Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Travel Purse
customer_reviews.text: This pocketbook worked perfectly for my trip to Europe. It is thin, not big or bulky, so it fits close to the body. I kept my money in the front pocket with the locked clasp. It has the perfect inside pockets to keep your passport and credit cards handy. I was able to put a selfie stick and a compact umbrella in it with room to spare. I like everything about it, however the reason for 4 stars instead of 5 is because the main compartment zipper lock broke right away. The little clasp does not spring back to the closed position and now snags on everything. I need to tape it so that it can't snag things.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara M. Poggetti

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Every day and even Better for Traveling !!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this purse. I bought it a year ago for a cruise I was going to, because I really wanted the security features it offered. I Loved the bag so much it became my everyday bag. So I have been using this bag exclusively for over a year now and it's still just like brand new. I did find a fantastic compartment a month after I bought it that is fantastic "hidden" storage. If you look on the top of the purse you will see a zipper, this zipper zips down the entire side and reveals a great deep space, not wide per se. This is a wonderful bag !!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Beth Bellomo

customer_reviews.title: Wore this for two weeks in Europe and loved it! The pocket is a bit awkward for ...
customer_reviews.text: Wore this for two weeks in Europe and loved it! The pocket is a bit awkward for the wearer to get into; but I guess that’s good if you want to keep the pickpockets out too. The purse is larger than I’d expected which meant I could fit my phone, wallet, and water bottle, with room to spare. I got the purple color and like it a lot. It is really well made and I always felt like my stuff was safe.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Best vacation purse i ahve ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag to take out of the country with me. It had a ton of compartments and zippers! It had a built in wallet, so don't worry about not being able to fit one. It locks which made me feel comfortable with that fact that I had my entire families passports on me at all times. The bag is also water proof, which was awesome for the beach. This bag is worth the money and extremely durable. I would by it again and again. I already talked my mother in law and best friend into buying one when they went out of the country!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Too Narrow of a Purse
customer_reviews.text: Has all of the bells and whistles that you want in a Travelon purse, but this was too small for my needs. Does not fit an iPad Air 2. Very narrow/flat purse, so will not fit anything bulky. Great for a phone, a small wallet, and very little else.
customer_reviews.author: Ana P.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for travel.
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for travel. I wish it was a little bigger. I couldn't fit my DSLR, extra lens, and wallet in it at the same time which was frustrating, but I made it work.
customer_reviews.author: Heather G.

customer_reviews.title: Broke upon first use!  Not secure!!
customer_reviews.text: Had one of theses and loved it so when it came time to travel I thought I’d update. Very first day of travel the top locking latch broke so I’m on an adventure without a safety latch. Since my trip is after the warranty it’s too late to return it. Word of caution- try it as soon as you get it. Don’t be in France with a broken bag!
customer_reviews.author: D. Perry

customer_reviews.title: ... everyday purse with the added benefit of it being great for travel
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use as an everyday purse with the added benefit of it being great for travel. The size is perfect. I can fit a work and a personal phone inside. There are multiple pockets to keep items organized and the central pocket when the zipper lock is released opens up wide, unlike many normal purses that are a challenge to dig to the bottom of. It's comfortable and lays flat on the body.
customer_reviews.author: RwQ

customer_reviews.title: Felt very safe.
customer_reviews.text: I wore this in Paris. through trains and subways (which I was told to be careful for pickpockets) it hugged my body and I wore it in front me. It had hooks to secure the zippers. Great protection. It also has the card reader security in it so I didn't need to put a wallet in there since there are slots for your ID and cards. I never felt unsafe while wearing this purse.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Taegel

customer_reviews.title: Tough
customer_reviews.text: Long lasting material combined with tough yet stylish outer and many inner pockets. Easy to navigate and super secure. Slash proof and pickpocket proof too as long as you pin up the zippers with the attachments provided. Great purse. Already bought 5. The First lasted 3 years before I decided to give it away to a friend. I am on the second one and bought the other three for friends working overseas. Not one complaint
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great travel bag
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these for a trip to Panama. They worked great. Neither of us took a wallet but used the bag to carry our passport, credit cards, cash, boarding passes, glasses, and other things we needed when ever we left the hotel. It was the perfect size and the clips on the exposed zippers gave us a secure feeling even in crowds. Highly recommended for travelers.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg G. Knepley

customer_reviews.title: Efficient and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cross-body bag on a recommendation from a friend who bought one a few years ago when she traveled abroad. I was looking for a cross-body bag that was comfortable and the right size. I have been pleased with this bag. The zippers work well (and lock, if you want to use the attached clip feature). There are many organizational pockets inside and the bag lays fairly flat against your body - which is great if you want to wear it under a large winter coat. The added safety features of the product are a plus, but did not influence my purchase much as this wasn't purchased for travel as much as it was for every-day use.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Merrill

customer_reviews.title: Larger Than it Appears
customer_reviews.text: Fits more than you would think! I purchased this for a trip abroad and felt like my personal items were safe. The purse wears nicely over the shoulder and lays pretty flat on your side if you don't pack it full. I liked the compartments and the ability to "lock" the more important areas of the purse. My phone, passports (4), small wallet, a few personal items, and even a thin book all fit in this purse.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Inside zipper broke within a few days
customer_reviews.text: Zipper on inside pocket broke on 15 day European trip. Upon return to US ,I find I am unable to return the purse due to 30 day limit. I'm not happy about this because this was the pocket I safely kept my passport in as it is deep. Workmanship on outer bag seems good however really surprised this zipper broke during first time use and unable to return! Strap can be uncomfortable with long hours if sightseeing and carrying. The pickpocket situation in the countries I visited is rampant and always felt safe carrying this bag, just unhappy I cannot get a replacement for the substandard workmanship on the inside zipper
customer_reviews.author: Traveling Gaga

customer_reviews.title: Well made with tons of pockets - a place for everything
customer_reviews.text: I would have absolutely loved this because it is so well made with lots of pockets, very durable, wonderful color. I could get right of all my individual containers and put everything directly in the bag - glasses, credit cards, ets. Only problem I had is that I use hand cream all the time as I have very dry skin and I kept getting the fabric dirty. I could was it fortunately but decided to go back to leather. I would highly recommend this product though.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L. Holmberg

customer_reviews.title: Flashlight already broken!
customer_reviews.text: I received the bag yesterday and all seems fine. I don’t travel to Italy until late Aug so I’ll update here then. However, I used the bag today..first time!..and the little flashlight has come apart. I’ve tried to follow the visual “directions” to put it back together but have not been successful. It honestly is just this tiny piece of plastic with a very tiny little bulb. So no flashlight after having the bag fewer than 24 hrs.
customer_reviews.author: Karyl Walter

customer_reviews.title: Cross-body for Across the World
customer_reviews.text: I just returned from a 21 day trip that included travels through England, Ireland, Italy, Spain, Portugal and Puerto Rico. All that to say that my Travelon cross body purse worked out great! It almost looked better on my boyfriend than it did on me too! I had zero issues and was extremely rough on it, as our travels included hiking in the mountains. I will reccommend this purse to all my friends. For the price one cannot pass it up!
customer_reviews.author: Des162

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Travel and Everyday
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of this cross body purse. I got it for upcoming travel to Europe. It has plenty of zippered compartments. Can hold a 12 oz bottle of water and fits closely to the body. Most zippered compartments have a locking mechanism . It's lightweight. I can't say enough good things. I got one with a teal lining so you can see what's inside easier.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C.

customer_reviews.title: Worked !!!
customer_reviews.text: Just took this bag on a trip and had an attempted pick-pocket, the lock on the main compartment was great - though the zipper on the front pocket it’s latch to lock broke on day one !!! So the bag served it’s safety purpose and that deserves 5 stars but after having a piece break off in one day I question parts of the quality
customer_reviews.author: jamie0807

customer_reviews.title: It's a 10 for safety and durability
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my trip to Italy, it was great while in Rome, considering all we hear about pickpocketing I did not have any worries or trouble, so for security I was calm. However it is a little thick as to be expected with extra security. Happy with the durability and safety aspects
customer_reviews.author: D. Z.

customer_reviews.title: Worry free from pickpockets
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my trip to India. It takes a bit of practice getting used to the clips as they are tight. I was glad I bought it. I felt more secure and didn't worry about pickpockets. The size is smaller that I thought it would be, but it turned out to be just right. Not too big to draw attention and large enough to carry many odds and ends. The beige color blended well with other colors. It's a very good purse to wear when in questionable places. Someone else on my tour had bought one as well.
customer_reviews.author: Niffer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect traveling purse
customer_reviews.text: I have zero complaints about this purse. It was perfect for travel and fit well into my backpack as well. I am still using it since returning home and have yet to have the desire to swap the convenient hands free functionality for my fashion bags.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The perfect travel purse
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a recent trip abroad. I ended up not using it in places I felt were more secure (Wales, England), but in Europe found it to be crucial. The size was nice, and easily fit quite a bit - my umbrella, maps and brochures, sunglasses, gloves, essentially whatever was called for. Would easily have fit a point-and-shoot camera, but since I'm a photographer, I was toting a DSLR. It would not fit an extra lens, in case you're wondering. I felt very secure walking around after dark in Paris with this thing, knowing the strap couldn't be cut, the zippers were secure, and it was at my side rather than behind me.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Kuethen

customer_reviews.title: I was using a backpack for airline travel, and ...
customer_reviews.text: I was using a backpack for airline travel, and was concerned about theft with the opening so accessible and potential as I am usually occupied with my dog, who typically goes with me. I wanted something safer and less cumbersome and this fits the bill. However -it proved to be quite a jump size wise -from backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Vic O

customer_reviews.title: Perfect secure travel purse
customer_reviews.text: I am traveling in Europe right now, and am loving this bag. It feels very secure and fits next to me easily, while having sufficient space for my phone, water bottle, odds and ends. Several others on my cruise have admired it when reminding one another to be wary of pick pockets. The zippers are quick to secure. The inside lining is bright to alert me when the zippers are open. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B

customer_reviews.title: There was a nice balance of "locking" zippers for more security and non ...
customer_reviews.text: Took this traveling to Italy where pickpocketing is a huge problem. This purse was never put to the test as I assume pickpockets saw that the zippers locked closed and was not worth the effort. I purchased three of these purses for myself, my mother, and my mother in law and none of us had anything swiped from us! There was a nice balance of "locking" zippers for more security and non locking pouches for convenience. The "lock" was simply a clip hook that attached to a D ring so that it could not be accessed discreetly but was still manageable to get into/out of.
customer_reviews.author: BakaNekoGato

customer_reviews.title: it doesn't open wide enough
customer_reviews.text: it has all the antitheft things you want on a bag: rfid, great straps, awkward opening locks. It is light weight and is a nice under the shoulder bag. If you need to get anything out of it, its a big pain. I would rather have a wider opening bag so I can actually see what I am trying to get. Otherwise a nice bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Travel Bag
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my trip to Texas. I wanted something lightweight and secure for traveling on airplanes and then while in Texas. I love all the pockets and security features! The bag was larger than I expected and was (at first) disappointed. While on vacation though - the extra room came in handy. Would definitely recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Loved it I carried it for a non-stop 5 months ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved it I carried it for a non-stop 5 months through Italy and it was worth every cent. I will be getting a new one for my next trip! My only con was that the zipper will get stuck sometimes but usually only when you try to overload the bag so it’s to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: the safety latch broke the second day I used it, so it was basically useless. The interior light fell apart before I even had a chance to try it and the strap had a buckle that kept snagging my sweater. The idea of the bag was smart, but the execution was terrible. I would NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: C. Merchant

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves this product.  It rocks!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this product. We continue to discover very brilliant design components that cover not only RFID security, but also protect against "slash & grab" or "reach-ins" by potential wrongdoers. The manufacturers really thought this one through.....even down to a "caribiner" to attach the purse to a chair when dining, as well as the placement of pockets for various items (e.g. cell phones) that maximize security. My wife also advises that the purse has more than enough room to hold all her "stuff," yet it is not "clunky." I subsequently purchased one of Travelon's RFID front-pocket men's wallets, and I am equally pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Radio Dave

customer_reviews.title: Love the color ; organizer bag for sure ; lightweight
customer_reviews.text: It’s so light compared to my old small bag. The strap is wide where it doesn’t leave you a mark , also there’s so many pockets where I don’t know what to put yet. Overall I love the color the simple of it looking and how manageable it is. I am all about organization so this bag is it. The only downfall is the size is a bit big but I’m sure when I’m traveling it will help.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Not super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I used this while on vacation in Belgium, the Netherlands, and Greece. I felt like all of my belongings were secure. The front pockets are quite small though and can be hard to pull stuff out if the inner pocket is full. The strap is not very comfortable on the shoulder. The purse is a bit smaller than I had hoped. I'll use it again in the future, I just wish it was more comfortable. I had been eyeing different options. If I could choose again, I would pick one with a water bottle holder on the outside. It can be quite annoying to have to lock and unlock the zipper every time you want some water.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent anti-theft zips along with style
customer_reviews.text: We bought this bag along with the mini shoulder bag for our trip to Italy. We had been warned and warned again about how excellent the pickpockets were in that country and were petrified of being robbed. But, this bag with it's anti-theft zips kept us and our belongings safe throughout the trip. Extremely lightweight and stylish looking too. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Malik

customer_reviews.title: That piece of information would have been good to have right off the bat thanks
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet. For an overseas trip in the fall. When I saw the warning label that it can cause cancer, I put it back in the mailer. That piece of information would have been good to have right off the bat thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not anti-theft
customer_reviews.text: Great for travel the only down fall is the whole hand bag not anti-theft. Only the credit cards part is anti-theft it was too late for me to return it so I threw the bag in the back of my closet and their were it will stay until it's time for a yard sale.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Manhertz

customer_reviews.title: daughter uses for travel
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses this for overseas travel trips. She has used it in several countries on several continents and it has worked fine. It is not designed to be a 'CARRY ALL" bag, it is designed for the essentials like, credit cards, cash, ID's and passports.
customer_reviews.author: juliannaB

customer_reviews.title: I love it's size (just right to where I can fit ...
customer_reviews.text: I have taken this purse on every trip I've gone on! I love it's size (just right to where I can fit everything I need... without over packing and lugging around a million lbs. all day) and it's super versatile. Can fit dressy and casual. The locking zippers are fantastic and I've never had any issues with pick pocketers. Definitely recommend this bag for durability, size, and versatility!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Best (Theft-proof) Travel Bag Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This travel bag was amazing for my recent trip to Italy! Whenever I am abroad, I'm always concerned about pickpockets because I almost had everything stolen on a trip once in Buenos Aires. I caught them just before they were able to fully unzip my backpack. You can never be too safe, and this purse thinks of everything! The straps and body of the bag are cut proof and the main pockets "lock" with a clip. This provided me with great peace of mind as we were in very crowded places where pickpockets lurk. In addition, it has RFID protected pockets to prevent from identity theft for your passport and cards. You will not be disappointed, plus it's fairly stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Jess B

customer_reviews.title: This bag was perfect !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Brought this last month for a trip to New York. I took it with me everywhere! The Statue of Liberty, bike riding in central park, subway, museums, etc. It never felt heavy. It rained for a, few hours and it didn't matter. It's waterproof! 😁 It was an excellent purchase! Plus the inside of the bag has a mini light in case you need to find something in dim lighting. I love this bag!!!! 🎉
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag last month for a 2 week trip to Italy and loved it. I was able to put a small (regular size) water bottle in the taller end of the bag and everything else I wanted to carry for the day. All the slots inside were useful, the turquoise interior color made it easy to find things, and there was still the tiny flashlight if I needed it. There was no sign of wear on it either. I will take it on another upcoming overseas trip.
customer_reviews.author: CO Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great crossbody
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to for traveling. I get to be hands free and have a stylish bag that even fits my water bottle. My only gripe is there is a lot of inside compartments. So many times I couldn’t find things because they slid into one of the numerous slots. Once I almost cancelled my credit card because I couldn’t find it. I found the zipper clip was perfect for hanging my face mask. I rode bikes, hiked, shopped did everything with it. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Pollich

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is everything I need. It's sturdy, not bulky, plenty of pockets and fits judt right. You can adjust the straps to suit your needs plus, it's not too heavy. I appreciate all the security features as well. If you're worried about the Proposition 65 tag, please check out the vid on YouTube and listen to this company's side of the story. Just search for Travelon and Proposition 65. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Honestly

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Just returned from an 18 day trip and this was perfect. Light weight but sturdy. Held all the essentials. Cross-body style is perfect, kept both hands free. Mine is in the purple and I found that it went with every outfit.
customer_reviews.author: JancieJ

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money to feel safe.
customer_reviews.text: It fit nicely against my body. Liked the adjustable strap. Lots of room, would have liked just a couple more inches on the main compartment so that I could have put my notepad in there. With the locking mechanisms I felt that everything was secure.
customer_reviews.author: R. Musgrove

customer_reviews.title: Safety at it's best!
customer_reviews.text: The cross body bag is fabulous! I love the safety features, the light weight of it and the fact, I have both hands free when shopping while keeping my bag next to me. It wipes clean with a damp rag and the top zipper compartment opens wide enough for me to locate the items I need very quickly. The inside pockets are awesome for keeping your other items from filling up the bottom of the bag. Love the little flash light in it! I use the back zipper compartment for storing my face mask, hand cleaner and plastic gloves. (Covid-19). I plan to order another one in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Georgella Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Secure & Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: After a recent trip to Rome, Italy, a place well known for pick-pockets, I highly recommend this purse. I brought three security containers: a money belt, a hidden pocket and this purse. After the first day I ditched all but this purse, as the only item that was secure AND comfortable to wear. I took it everywhere with me. It comfortably slung across my body, the construction was well made, the "locks" were easy to use and I never once felt concerned about my valuables. I could also stuff quite a bit inside: kindle, wallet, scarf, passport. I will keep this for my next trip abroad!
customer_reviews.author: Eden Celeste

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a trip to Iceland. Its stylish enough to wear out in the city, but durable enough to take on an adventure when I'm not bringing my backpack. Made getting through the airport a little easier since I could organize things into all the different compartments and I felt safer since everything zipped shut. It has also been useful at home for trips to the zoo or concerts where I don't want to bring my normal purse. I can even fit a bottle of water in it! Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie S.

customer_reviews.title: Well Designed Travel Bag
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a trip to France and Italy. Worked great the whole time, I felt very secure (the locking zippers are a great feature and the material is very sturdy) and it didn't look too touristy while wearing it. The front pockets were great for headphones and maps and the interior fit 2 passports, several credit cards, a sunglasses case, my phone, and a small zipper bag with some room to spare. I'm left handed and wore this cross body over my right shoulder and had easy access to zippers. The adjustable strap made it very comfortable for long hours of wear .
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag. My husband and I spent 9 days in Europe and I always felt safe carrying this purse with our money and passports in it. The zippers that clip so they won't open is great as well as the cut proof strap. My only regret is that I didn't get a bigger one. I will definitely use this when we travel from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Not So Secure Anti-Theft Bag
customer_reviews.text: After 3 short uses the clasp that holds the zipper securely closed for the main compartment broke. Very disappointed as now I don't feel confident using this to travel since the main security feature no longer works, especially after so few uses. I only paid $30 for this but I have seen them being sold for much more, don't waste your money if you are looking for security features. I did read about this problem from other reviewers and took my chances. Wow, did I learn my lesson.
customer_reviews.author: alison

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this bag. It's a secure way to take camera gear on my next trip to Europe. There is a pocket inside the perfect size for a telephoto lense. My cannon rebel fits in snug beside it. I even have room to put in my phone, iPad mini, extra lenses, and basic passport/ travel documents. It's a tight squeeze with everything, but this bag is surprisingly roomy for being so compact.
customer_reviews.author: Cecile

customer_reviews.title: Happy Purchase:)
customer_reviews.text: I initially purchased this bag for an international trip; I brought it with me and felt very safe given all the features. My normal purse was a black/brown kate spade bag as I like the sleek/professional look of it and it matched most outfits, however when I returned from my trip I continued to use this as my everyday purse..... And I still am, three months later! Lol. I love this bag and would highly recommend it. I'll admit it's not the cutest thing for my taste, but I love it so much that I don't even care. It's just very convenient and comfortable. Kind of gives off a hippy vibe, and I'm okay with that. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Kass

customer_reviews.title: Too tight
customer_reviews.text: This is a very tight fit. The inside is practically flat and the outside pockets are so tight that you can barely put your hand in. It's stiff and does not expand. Of the $38 cost, I had to pay $7.42 to return it. Wasted money.
customer_reviews.author: shopperb

customer_reviews.title: Has all the right components.
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly for all of the things I needed to carry in a purse. The separate compartments were just the right size. I was in a very rainy situation, and the purse did an excellent job of keeping most of the water out; just a little leakage at the zipper areas. The adjustable strap worked well, and the purse was quite comfortable and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Secure Purse
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, has zippers that have clips on them that keep them secure. It is decent size for small wallet and a few other items, I used it for my Vegas adventures it fits up against my body and does not flop around when walking. I think I would have liked it to be a bit bigger but I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: RLM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent crossbody purse
customer_reviews.text: Loved the purse. I wore it crossbody towards the front not side. The locking system is great and felt secure in all the places where I was told there were pickpockets during my trip overseas. It's light weight, looks good, color went with every outfit while I traveled in Europe (nutmeg). I got caught in the rain and the things inside (my passport, important documents) didn't get wet. I loved it so much that I am getting one for each of my daughters! I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: tpeg

customer_reviews.title: Fort Knox of Anti-Theft bags, but too small for what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: A very secure travel bag. The material is a little plastic / shiny looking, but extraordinarily strong. My regret is that I didn't buy a bigger version of it. I was hoping to put a camera and lens in this along with my wallet, cosmetics bag... but it wasn't large enough for that. This bag does not stretch. The outside pockets didn't really seem all that secure to me, easy to lift them up. But otherwise, the caribiner locks and little mini light were great features. I gave this bag to someone who could use it for a smaller, local trip.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling and security
customer_reviews.text: We got this for a trip to Barcelona where we were worried about pickpockets. This was great for security, it fits a lot, and the zippers latch so they can't be easily opened. I would definitely take this to travel in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Just listen

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it. All materials and zippers good quality. useful mini led torch included. Great for europe travel. Be sure the size fits your needs. Under jacket is almost unnoticeable. It is pretty safe since in crowded places you cover it with your arm, and at least as long as a robber does not ask you for it.
customer_reviews.author: David CR

customer_reviews.title: Midnight color is beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my mother who is beginning to show signs of Alzheimers. I am hoping that I can reference this bag as her birthday gift when she begins to forget who I am. She loved the color and I was so happy to have found just the right shade of blue for her. The angular design eats up some of the space, but she carries so little these days it works for her. There are also pockets that compensate for the interior. I find it a little pricey but worth the smile on my mother's face.
customer_reviews.author: BJC

customer_reviews.title: Italy trip
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for traveling to foreign countries and walking . This purses are durable and keep you safe. You won't stick out with this purse like high fashion purse. They protect all your credit cards from being tracked or scanned since have block to prevent hackers to steal your information.
customer_reviews.author: italia123

product_meta.title: Travelon Anti-Theft Cross-Body Bag, Black, One Size
product_meta.description: Color:BlackThis bag fits snuggly up against your body and looks great doing it! The slash-proof construction and adjustable, cut-proof shoulder strap is great, you can attach it to any post or chair for added safety and convienience. Also comes with an RFID blocking card slots as well as a handy removable LED light.
feature_bullets: Removable LED light. Size: 12 x 14.5 x 1.5 inches
Slash-resistant body construction and slash-resistant, adjustable shoulder strap attaches to post or chair

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars2,823 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
